full_summary: ### Announcement: Tenders for Window Cleaning Services --- #### Tender ID: WS3915475756 **Category:** Service Contract **Solicitation Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering **Offer Due Date and Time:** June 16, 2023, 14:00 HNE (Eastern North American) **Contact Information:** Shauna Barrett (SPAC/PSPC) Email: #### Project Overview Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites bids from qualified bidders to provide window cleaning services, including labor, supervision, transportation, tools, materials, and equipment for the Food Production Facility Kitchen located at 1170 Algoma Rd, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. #### Description of Services *Provision of window cleaning and height cleaning services to clean windows on the Food Production Facility Kitchen at 1170 Algoma Rd, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. #### Amendment to Closing Time Please disregard the previous closing time and deadline. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by June 16, 2023 at 14:00 HNE. #### Bidder Requirements * Site visit arrangements have been made for May 29th, 2023 at 13h30. Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than May 23rd, 2023 at 14h00 to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) and date of birth of the person(s) who will attend. *Attendance is mandatory, and Bidders who subsequently refuse will be declared non-responsive. * Only bona fide contractors may submit bids. * Tenderers must possess a valid Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) Business Number and a valid Revenu Québec Business Number, as applicable. A site visit is mandatory. The announcement,(,tp=n str flow the Protocol* #### Address for Tender Response Please submit your bid to the following address: Tenders are to be posted on http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16141906?extsite=MTYxNDE5MDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==] **Zone 1 - Zones** No zone specific information has been provided.
